*A note on EIA data: The EIA reports reserves in billions of barrels but reports production in thousands of barrels per day. To convert production data to the same scale, which is necessary to create the oil discovery variable, multiply the EIAÕs production variable by 365/1000000 and add 1/365th of this for leap years.
